overall a decent game with a few flaws   poor optimization and unstable performance  frequently gets stuck when walking or running on uneven terrainsometimes even on flat ground  item looting is buggy the glow and prompt often remain after looting only disappearing after multiple attempts  boss loot is usually obscured by their body after death making it easy for new players to miss  character and location names are often long and in french its hard to remember who is who

still really buggy areas where you get softlocked game crashes if you leave it open for too long game crashes if you take the boat to paris twice why would that even be an option a lot of achievements are just unobtainable like the collect clothes civillians and weapons cant reccomend in the current state

the game is far from being perfect and it could definetely use several technical improvements that being said the concept is wonderful being myself a sucker for anything related to automatons androids and artificial life in general i immediately felt in love with the main character and her implications in a well imagined but unfortunately not so refined story  i consider steelrising a beautiful and underrated rough gem i love it and i hope to see similar concepts in the future
